problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠C=90°,分别以A、B为圆心,2为半径画圆,则图中阴影部分的面积和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠C = N_0, draw a circle with A and B as the center and N_1 as the radius, then the sum of the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:由题意可得:阴影部分的面积是两扇形的面积,∵∠C=90°,∴∠A+∠B=90°,根据扇形公式得:阴影部分的面积为\frac{(∠A+∠B)π}{360}×2²=π．故选:C．
